新型コロナウイルス感染症が心配なときに: How to get help if you suspect having COVID-19
詳細を見る（東京都福祉保健局）: Details:See the website (of Tokyo Metropolitan Government Bureau of Social Welfare and Public Health)
相談方法は、症状や状況別で3つに分かれます: Which of the following is your situation?
かかりつけ医がいて症状のある方: You are experiencing symptoms and have a primary care doctor
かかりつけ医がいない症状のある方: You are experiencing symptoms and do not have a primary care doctor
かかりつけ医がいない、次の症状がある方: If you do not have a primary care doctor and have the following:
かかりつけ医がいて、次の症状がある方: If you have a primary care doctor and have the following:
日ごろ受診されている医療機関に電話でご相談ください。: Call to consult your doctor or medical institution.
新型コロナ受診相談窓口は、24時間対応しています: The COVID-19 Consultation Hotline is available 24 hours.
{publicHealthCenter}に掲載しています: Please See this page for details {publicHealthCenter}
各保健所の電話番号は福祉保健局HP: Detail: Check each call-number of Public Health Center on the web page (by Tokyo Bureau of Social Welfare and Public Health)
上記の症状に当てはまらない方は、新型コロナコールセンターにご相談ください。: If you do not have these symptoms, contact the Tokyo COVID-19 Call Center.
医師が検査の必要性を判断いたします。: A doctor will determine the need for a test.
マスクをして公共交通機関をできるだけ使わずに受診をしてください。: Wear a mask and avoid public transportation if possible.
医師により検査が必要だと判断されPCR検査（東京都健康安全研究センター等）を受け: After a doctor determines that a test is needed, you receive a PCR test at the Tokyo Metropolitan Institute of Public Health or elsewhere, and you:
感染症指定医療機関等への入院、又は宿泊施設等での療養となります: You will be admitted to a designated medical institution or lodging facility to receive treatment.
ただし、症状が良くならない場合は再度受診相談窓口またはかかりつけ医に相談してくだ: If your symptoms do not improve, consult your doctor or the Tokyo COVID-19 Consultation Hotline.
自分や家族の症状に不安や心配があればまずは電話相談をどうぞ: Please call us as first, If you have any concerns of symptom about you or your family.

臨時休校中の新型コロナウイルス感染症対応についてのお願い: About attentions for children's living while school is closed due to COVID-19
不特定多数の人の集まる場所等への外出を避け、基本的に自宅で過ごしてください。: Please avoid going out to places where the general public gather and basically stay at home.
手洗い、咳エチケット等により、感染予防に努めてください。: Please make sure that everyone in your family washes hands regularly and practice cough etiquette.
【参考】感染症予防のための正しい手洗い方法（動画）: [Video] How to wash your hands properly to prevent infection
規則正しい生活を心がけ、日常の健康管理に十分気を付けてください。: Try to live a regular life and monitor the health of your children daily.
感染症を疑う場合の対応: If you might your child was infected
各保健所にご相談ください: If you have strong symptoms such as dyspnea, malaise, and high fever, or continue to have relatively mild cold such as fever and cough, please call the public health center.

当サイトは新型コロナウイルス感染症 (COVID-19) に関する最新情報を提供: This website was opened by the Tokyo Metropolitan Government to provide the latest information of COVID-19.
東京都による公式情報と客観的な数値をわかりやすく伝えることで、東京都にお住まいの: By conveying official information of the Tokyo Metropolitan Government and objective data in an easy-to-understand way, this site aims to allow Tokyo residents, companies with offices in Tokyo, and visitors to Tokyo to grasp the current situation and take measures and precautions accordingly.
当サイトは以下の環境でご覧いただくことを推奨いたします。: This site is recommended to view in following browsers
Google Chrome 最新版（Windows 10以上, Android: Google Chrome latest version (Windows 10 or later, Android 8.0 or later)

当サイトへのリンクは自由です。: For free about linking to this site.

当サイトをご利用の際には、JavaScriptを有効にして頂きますようお願いいた: Please run JavaScript when you're browsing this site.
クッキーとは、Webコンテンツからの要求で利用者の手元の端末に一時的に保存される: A cookie is data sent from a website and temporarily stored on the user's computer. Here, cookies may be used to track website activity.
ブラウザに関する情報の収集を希望しない場合は、インターネット閲覧ソフト（ブラウザ: If you do not wish your browsing data to be collected, you can disable cookies from your web browser.
ただし、クッキーを受け入れない設定をされている場合は、当サイトの機能が正常に動作: However, if you disable cookies, this site may not function properly.
Google Analyticsの利用について: About the using of Google Analytics
当サイトでは、サービス向上やサイトの改善のためにGoogle LLCの提供するア: This site uses Google Analytics, an analytics service provided by Google LLC, to track website activity for site improvement and provision of better services.
Google Analyticsでは、当サイトが発行するクッキー (Cookie: Google Analytics uses Cookies to collect anonymous usage data(page views, traffic, used OS/browser information and so on). We use {Cookies based on Google's privacy policy and terms.
取得したデータはWebサイト利用状況を分析しサービスの改善につなげるため、または: The collected data will be used only to analyze website usage and services improvement, or to create reports for publishers, and only to provide other services. (In the report to publishers, cookies count the number of users of this site on a browser-by-browser basis. Google Analytics uses the IP address analysis function to determine the geographical distribution of the access source (country, state / prefecture, city)
Google Analyticsの利用規約及びプライバシーポリシーに関する説明に: For more about Google Analytics Terms of Service and Privacy Policy, please visit the Google Analytics site.
Google Analyticsによる情報送信を回避する場合は、Google が: If you want to avoid sending information by Google Analytics, please use {addon} supported by Google.
当サイトに掲載されている情報の正確性については万全を期していますが、東京都は利用: Although every effort has been made to ensure the accuracy of the information posted on this site, Tokyo Metropolitan Government will not be responsible for any actions taken by users using the information on this site.
また、利用者が当サイトを利用したことにより発生した利用者の損害及び利用者が第三者: The Tokyo Metropolitan Government will not be responsible for any damage that may occur to a user or damage that the user may cause to a third party, as a result of using this website.
当サイトに掲載されている情報は、予告なしに変更又は削除することがあります。: The Information on this site will be subject to change or delete without notice

For others, call after 4 days of continued symptoms.

集団感染発生や曜日による件数のばらつきにより、日々の結果が変動するため、こうした: The positive rate here is 7 days moving average that levels the day-to-day variation caused mass infection and others, with consideration on the purpose of overall trend analysis. (6)は日曜日、祝日は更新しない。(7)は土曜日、日曜日、祝日は更新しない: (6) is not updated on Sundays and national holidays. (7) is not updated on Saturdays, Sundays, and national holidays
陽性率：陽性判明数の移動平均／（陽性判明数＋陰性判明数）の移動平均: Rate of Test Positives : Moving average of test positive patients /Moving average of Tested people (as test positive + negative cases)
(1)(2)(6)(7)は７日間移動平均で算出。また、(1)が10人以下となった: (1), (2), (6), (7) are calculated as a 7-day moving average. if the number of (1) is less than 10 people, (2) and (3) shall be reference values.
